content: this reindeer snood pattern is designed to fit a greyhound with instructions on how to adjust the pattern to fit your dog you may be able to adjust this pattern to fit other breeds i recommend a 4 weight yarn and 5 5 mm hook for the snood however you can use a different weight and hook size if you wish you will just need to adjust the pattern slightly the antlers use a 3 weight yarn and 3 mm hook
